tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_date DATE,
    ai_system_id INT,
    regulation_id INT,
    violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE System_Compliance (
    system_id INT,
    regulation_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    compliance_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (system_id, regulation_id, standard_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES AI_Systems(system_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES Regulations(regulation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES Standards(standard_id)
);

CREATE TABLE system_regulations (
    system_id INT,
    regulation_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (system_id, regulation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES ai_systems_compliance(system_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE system_standards (
    system_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (system_id, standard_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES ai_systems_compliance(system_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES standards(standard_id)
);
